doc.previous: The Tagus is the longest river in the peninsula and like the Douro flows westwards with its lower course in Portugal The Guadiana bends southwards and forms the border between Spain and Portugal in the last stretch of its course
doc.after: The terrain of the Iberian Peninsula is largely mountainous The major mountain systems are
